Description.Text: Hotel Konak is located 400 meters away from the heart of stanbul, Taksim Square, offers easy Access to restaurants, historical sites, shopping areas and business centers. Hotel Konak features 117 rooms with 234 bed capacity and offers the functionality and comfort combined. You may choose the room type that suits you best from: 3 Suits, 4 Deluxe, 16 Connected and 1 room furnished specially for disabled guest. Free wireless internet access is available at the hotel lobby and in all the rooms as forethought for their guest on business trip. They renovated and refurbished the hotel in order to embrace the new trends of hospitality such as comfort, technology and style put together. As a result hotel created the new motto "The hotel will provide a joyful stay for all by their available and perfectionist staff". The colourful rooms at the Hotel Konak combine traditional dcor with modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi, LCD TV and a tea/coffee maker. The Konak's front desk can arrange sightseeing tours, car rental and provide information on local attractions. Remarks: Car Parking : 7 Dinner : 60 ( for 3 pax) The hotel also offers airport transfer - at cost, dry cleaning, lobby and reception.

This modern 4-star hotel in Istanbul is situated 300 metres from the Congress Centre and just a 7-minute walk from Taksim Square. Konak Hotel is 400 metres public transportation links offering access to the rest of Istanbul. Dolmabahce Palace is 750 metres, Galata Tower is 3 km from the hotel.

Single room - Single room offers french bed or single bed with air conditioning, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, pay TV, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, wi - fi internet, tea and coffee making facilities. 18sqm/22sqm modern and comfortable rooms feature twin/French bed, study table, LCD TV, wireless internet, digital safe (laptop size), kettle and complimentary tea-coffee, direct telephone line, shower (with shower cap) or bathtub, WC and slippers.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers french or two single beds with air conditioning, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, pay TV, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, wi - fi internet, tea and coffee making facilities. 18sqm/30sqm modern and comfortable rooms feature twin/French bed, study table, LCD TV, wireless internet, digital safe (laptop size), kettle and complimentary tea-coffee, direct telephone line, shower (with shower cap) or bathtub, WC and slippers
Triple Room - Triple Room offers 3 single beds or 1 french and 1 single bed with air conditioning, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, color TV, disabled facilities, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, pay TV, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, wi - fi internet, tea and coffee making facilities. All of the 30sqm spacious and comfortable rooms feature lounge corner, study table, balcony, LCD TV, satellite TV, wireless internet, digital safe (laptop size), kettle and complimentary tea-coffee, direct telephone line, separate shower and WC and slippers.
